Congratulations to Yemeni Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, Premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Abdul Kader Ba-Jammal upon his reappointment as Prime Minister of Yemen.
 The message wished him greater success in his work to achieve security, stability and economic prosperity of the country and expressed the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.    
 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a similar message to his Yemeni counterpart Abu Bakr Abdullah al-Kirbi upon his reappointment as foreign minister.
